title: 🌐 Economic Agent Symphony: Unified Math Framework for Dynamic Asset Worlds 🚀
description: This paper crafts a unified mathematical lens 🔍 to blend agent-based simulations with dynamic asset pricing, unveiling the synergies in complex economic systems 📈. From bonding curves to airdrops, it explores mechanisms that drive price formation and wealth distribution in decentralized economies 💰🌟. Through simulation and optimization, it paves the way for analyzing real-world policies and fostering innovation in tokenized finance 🚀🧠.
